entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 60%

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
